title: JFrog Platform Cloud
description: The dashboard consolidates Artifactory `access-audit.log`, `artifactory-request.log` and `access-security-audit.log`  to show HTTP Requests, Requests Logs, Operations and Audit Operations summary.

definition.content: JFrog Platform Cloud Log Analytics

This dashboard provides a high-level summary of the usage of the JFrog Artifactory Cloud instance. This includes an overview of access requests, and audit events as well as a summary of various operations performed on JFrog Artifactory.
The number of Artifactory requests, grouped by HTTP response code.
The number of Artifactory requests with HTTP response code matching 4xx.
Top list of IP addresses with the number of requests, associated with these IP addresses.

definition.title: Requests duration and request/response content length

definition.content: Correlation between request/response length and the duration of the call.
The number of Artifactory requests with HTTP response code matching 5xx.
The number of requests created by particular users.

definition.title: Accessed resources by username, instance name and IP address

definition.content: Total number of logs streamed to DataDog.
The list of resource paths, accessed by users, includes the path, username and instance name and grouped by IP address.
Top list or accesses docker repositories.
The graph of accessed Docker repositories as a timeseries.

definition.title: Accessed docker images by name and response code (top chart)

definition.content: Top list or accesses docker images, grouped by HTTP response code.
The graph of accessed Docker images as a timeseries.
Operations, performed by users, associated with event name (TKN, GRP, USR etc.) and event type (CRUD).
List of all operations (CRUD), performed on tokens as a timeseries, grouped by `entity_name`, which is a performing user.
List of all operations (CRUD), performed on permission targets.
List of all operations (CRUD), performed on users.
List of all operations (CRUD), performed on groups.
Total number of access security audit logs streamed to DataDog.
Total number of access audit logs streamed to DataDog.
Actions by type.
Actions by type, excluding NA users.
Top list of deployed artifacts by username.

definition.title: Denied actions by IP, no NA

definition.content: All types of denied actions by IP address.
All types of denied actions by IP address, excluding NA users.
Denied logins by username.

definition.title: Denied logins by username, no NA
Denied downloads by username and instance

definition.content: Denied logins by username, excluding NA users.
Denied downloads by username and instance name.
Top users activity, timeseries.

definition.title: Denied logins by IP, no NA
Accepted deployments by username and instance

definition.content: Denied logins per IP address.
Denied logins per IP address, excluding NA users.
Accepted deployments by username and instance name.

definition.title: Accepted downloads by username and instance

definition.content: Accepted downloads by username and instance name.
